definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[יְפֵה־פִיׇּה]], rd. [[יְפֵהפִיׇּה]], or better [[יְפֵיפִיׇּה]] (Ol:§ 188 a Gr Gie; reduplicated, with the force of a diminutive, Sta:§ 156; cf. [[אֲדַמְדָּם]], [[יְרַקְרַק]]),

definitions.title: adj. f.
definitions.body: pretty, [[עֶנְלָה יְפֵה־פִיׇּה מִחְרַיִם]] Je 46:20 Egypt is a pretty heifer (LXX kekallwpisme/nh).
